Django Revolution

Zone-based API Architecture for Django

Install and go. Automatically generate TypeScript and Python clients from your Django API.

Features

  • üöÄ Zone-based Architecture - Organize your API endpoints into logical zones
  • ‚ö° Auto Client Generation - Generate TypeScript and Python clients automatically
  • üîß Django Integration - Seamless integration with Django REST Framework
  • üì¶ Monorepo Support - Optional monorepo integration
  • üéØ Simple Setup - Just install, configure, and run
  • üõ†Ô∏è CLI Tools - Powerful command-line tools

Quick Start

# Install Django Revolution
pip install django-revolution

# Add to your Django settings
INSTALLED_APPS = [
    # ... your apps
    'django_revolution',
]

# Configure zones
DJANGO_REVOLUTION = {
    'zones': {
        'public': {
            'description': 'Public API endpoints',
            'urls': 'your_app.urls.public',
        },
        'private': {
            'description': 'Private API endpoints',
            'urls': 'your_app.urls.private',
        },
    }
}

# Add to your main urls.py
from django_revolution.urls_integration import add_revolution_urls

urlpatterns = [
    # ... your URLs
]

add_revolution_urls(urlpatterns)

Generate Clients

# Generate OpenAPI schema and clients
python manage.py revolution

# This creates:
# - openapi/schema.yaml
# - clients/typescript/
# - clients/python/
